content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI previously used the command "browse_website" to visit blackbeltmag.com and asked "What is the history of karate?" but received no relevant information. Additionally, I executed the command "list_files" to list all files in the current directory, but it returned too much output and I was warned not to execute it again with the same arguments. I then attempted to clone a repository using the command "clone_repository", but received an error message stating that the repository could not be found. Finally, I used the command "generate_image" to prompt the generation of an image of a martial arts scene.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command generate_image returned: Saved to disk:/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/71bb82fa-a264-41a8-a27a-6525e91dbfe2.jpg'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "martial_arts_poem.txt", "text": "The way of the warrior, the path of the sage\\nMartial arts, a journey of the mind and the age\\nA quest for balance, a search for truth\\nA way of life, a path to youth\\n\\nWith every strike, with every move\\nWe learn to focus, to improve\\nTo channel our energy, to find our strength\\nTo rise above, to go the length\\n\\nThrough practice and dedication\\nWe master our art, our creation\\nWe find our place in the world\\nOur spirit, our flag unfurled\\n\\nMartial arts, the way of the warrior\\nA path to peace, to a brighter future"}}}'}]
"""
